subject: Exemption from payment of user fee
text: 9Trru <r4ly 7THT gfedsrut T714 /Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Hea5 4Raa7t 8< 7oTHN TTT) 447 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 #T National Highways Authority of India QA: Extn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 01-5 & 6, #4er-10, Errat, 7 fiorlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/3/CMD-CO/10-11/ Policy on Toll 17th March, 2011 Circular No. NHAICommercial Operation/128. Sub: Exemption from Payment of User Fee: 1. It has been   brought to the notice of the Authority that vehicles transporting the Hon'ble Members of Parliament MP) with MP sticker are charged user  fee( toll tax) at plazas and the personnel posted at the plazas are also not aware of the protocol to be extended to Hon"ble Members / VIPs. 2 It is brought to your notice that as per the amendment issued vide GSR 950(E) dt 3rd Dec, 2010 to the National Highways Fee Determination of Rates and Collection) Rules 2008, & mechanical_vehicle_transporting_and accompanying _the_Member_of_Parliament_is exempted from payment of user fee( toll tax): 3_ of above notification has already been forwarded to all Regional offices and PIUs/ CMUs under the Authority letter no. NHAI/13013/10- 11/CO-CMD/20 dt: 18.02.2011. The rule position shall be brought to the notice of all concerned for compliance: 4 In view of above Authority desires that all Regional officers as well as Project Directors   shall ensure that such unpleasant incidents  shall not happen in their respective areas of jurisdiction in future It is further requested to ensure that personnel posted at the are advised to be Z:IGM(COJIDGM(CO) Policy on tolllCircular 2011.doc 1[ |  7 T 4 NHAL being Copy plazas wo/)
